title: Kitchen Cleaning Sponges,24 Pack Eco Non-Scratch for Dish,Scrub Sponges…
features: 【Powerful cleaning】: The scratch-free soft yellow sponge surface has good water absorption, and the high-quality green scrubbing pad on one side is designed to effortlessly remove oil and burnt food.
【Efficient and durable】: High density sponge with good resilience, not easily deformed, even after multiple use, it is not easy to wear and can protect nails during the cleaning process.

【Longer lasting detergents】: Use only a small amount of detergent or water. These cleaning sponges dry quickly and can remove excess liquid by simply pressing. They are reusable and can be cleaned to extend their service life.

【The best household cleaning aid 】: It has a better grip effect and fits your hands comfortably. The soft sponge can easily produce foam. A little detergent makes a lot of foam. Easy to clean dishes, cups, countertops, sinks, windows, bathtubs, toilets and floors. 100% natural materials are harmless to health.

【You will receive 】 24-packs of sponges that can reduce more pollution in our homes and make your life more comfortable. If you have any questions about the product or customer service, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time. We support and advise you here!
description: Product Description High density sponge is prone to foaming and only requires a small amount of detergent, making it easy to clean your plates, pots, pans, sinks, and stoves. It is suitable for wiping lightly greasy tableware and strong cleaning makes your household chores easier. Durable Material It can effectively remove stubborn stains and is not easily torn or worn even after multiple uses. Non sand materials can be used for non stick pans, easy to clean, scratch free, and have good water absorption.
